name: JFrogArtifactoryDownloader
description: This task helps you to download artifacts published to Artifactory during a build
author: jfrog
helpMarkDown: Download Artifacts linked to a build from Artifactory.

inputs.name: artifactoryEndpointName
inputs.label: Artifactory URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory URL to download your artifacts from.

inputs.name: overrideCredentials
inputs.label: Override Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override credentials given in service configuration.

inputs.name: login
inputs.label: User Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: User with permissions to deploy to the selected Artifactory repository

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: User Encrypted Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for the user entered above. Note: It is higly recommended to use an encrypted password so that your password is never passed in clear text to Artifactory.

inputs.name: BuildNumberInput
inputs.label: Build Number (leave blank for latest build).

inputs.name: buildStatus
inputs.label: Build Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Status of the build you are looking for. The task will download all artifacts linked to the latest build with the defined status. If empty and the task is triggered by a build the task will download artifacts generated by this one. If not it will download the latest
